attachments.title: NextGen Skills Academy | Apprenticeships
attachments.text: Earn as you learn in the workplace. Take time out to study in the classroom. A NextGen Apprenticeship can offer the best of both worlds, giving you invaluable experience and knowledge to kick-start your career. ‍
